amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-21 to make technical changes to H.R. 1009 to ensure consistency in dates and terms, require OIRA to review significant guidance, and prohibit the authorization of additional funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-21 to make technical changes to H.R. 1009 to ensure consistency in dates and terms, require OIRA to review significant guidance, and prohibit the authorization of additional funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mitchell amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Mitchell.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mitchell amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
